title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons in the Available Items sector do not show up.
EB: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. In the Available Items sector, expand Data Source by clicking the related icon. 2. Expected Result: Table icons and column icons will show up. 3. Actual Result: Column icons don't show up.
SR: 1. Open the application and navigate to the Available Items sector. 2. Expand Data Source by clicking the related icon. 3. Observe that the column icons are not displayed.
